Welcome to Dhow Enterprises Ltd.

Dhow Enterprises ltd is a leading regional logistics and freight provider of world class supply chain solutions, with a global reach to 150 countries through its strategic alliance with global network partners. With its full connectivity from strategically located state-of-the-art facilities at the world's most important frieght hubs.

Dhow Enterprises is available for below services

Commodities Services

Supply of Rice, Weight, Cement

Trading Services

Supply of Tarpaulin, Tyre, Tool and Auto Spare Parts

Freight Services

Container Delivery

Logistics Services

Storage of goods, Loading, Unloading

Construction Materials

Steel Sheet, Steel Beam

Engineering Equipment

Compass and Clinometers

Medical Supply

Mask and Canisters

Consultancy & Advisory

Business Enhancement Advice & Techniques

Dhow Enterprises Ltd is involved in trading of commodities such as building construction materials, engineering equipment, oil and other petroleum products.

  • The company is also engaged in consultancy services providing studies on various projects.
  • The company will be providing logistics and freight services for the physical distribution of goods from pickup and delivery. The company will be responsible for packing, loading and unloading of items.
  • The company will be providing procurement and chartering services for various vessel. Vessels will submit their purchase requests and the company will ensure that their requests are fulfilled.
  • The company will additionally be trading in automobile spare parts. Some of them are bumpers, radiators, filters, batteries, plugs, fenders, ball joints, shock absorbers, body parts, bearings, plugs, lamps and lights (i.e. headlamps, corner lamps, tail lights and so on), sensors, rims, grills, lubricants, amongst others.
